subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Ottawa Senators ruined Sidney Crosby’s playoff debut Wednesday night with a 6-3 victory over the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins in the opening game of their Eastern Conference first-round series.
snippet: The Ottawa Senators ruined Sidney Crosby’s playoff debut Wednesday night with a 6-3 victory over the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins in the opening game of their Eastern Conference first-round series.
